tasks.name: MP4 container parser/demuxer
tasks.description: Parse MP4 container format (moov, mdat boxes) and extract audio/video tracks with H.264, H.265, AV1, AAC, MP3, Opus codecs
acceptance_criteria: Extract video track metadata (codec, resolution, duration)
Extract audio track metadata (codec, sample rate, channels)

tasks.name: WebM container parser/demuxer
tasks.description: Parse WebM container format (EBML/Matroska subset) and extract VP8, VP9, AV1, Vorbis, Opus streams

tasks.name: Ogg container parser/demuxer
tasks.description: Parse Ogg container format for Theora video and Vorbis/Opus audio

tasks.name: MKV/Matroska container parser
tasks.description: Parse Matroska/MKV container format with full EBML support
acceptance_criteria: Extract H.264, VP9, AV1 video tracks

tasks.name: MPEG-TS container parser
tasks.description: Parse MPEG Transport Stream format for H.264/H.265 video and AAC/MP3 audio

tasks.name: FLV container parser
tasks.description: Parse Flash Video container format

tasks.name: H.264/AVC decoder
tasks.description: Decode H.264/AVC video streams with profile/level support and hardware acceleration
acceptance_criteria: Decode H.264 Baseline, Main, High profiles

common_pitfalls.solution: Implement Drop trait, release FFmpeg resources
Use frame buffer pool, prioritize I-frames

tasks.name: H.265/HEVC decoder
tasks.description: Decode H.265/HEVC video streams with profile/tier/level support

tasks.name: VP8 decoder
tasks.description: Decode VP8 video codec

tasks.name: VP9 decoder
tasks.description: Decode VP9 video codec with profile support

tasks.name: AV1 decoder
tasks.description: Decode AV1 video codec with profile/level support
acceptance_criteria: Decode AV1 Main, High, Professional profiles

tasks.name: Theora decoder
tasks.description: Decode Theora video codec for Ogg containers

tasks.name: AAC decoder
tasks.description: Decode AAC audio with profile, sample rate, and channel support

tasks.name: MP3 decoder
tasks.description: Decode MP3 audio with layer and bitrate support

tasks.name: Opus decoder
tasks.description: Decode Opus audio with sample rate, channels, and application mode support
acceptance_criteria: Support VOIP, Audio, and LowDelay applications

tasks.name: Vorbis decoder
tasks.description: Decode Vorbis audio codec

tasks.name: FLAC decoder
tasks.description: Decode FLAC lossless audio codec

tasks.name: PCM audio handling
tasks.description: Handle raw PCM audio with various formats, sample rates, and channel configurations

tasks.name: MediaEngine trait implementation
tasks.description: Implement the core MediaEngine trait with all session management and playback control methods
acceptance_criteria: Duration and current time tracking accurate
tasks.reconciliation_notes: Work detected via /orch-reconcile-queue. MediaEngineImpl implements MediaEngine trait with create_session, load_source, play, pause, seek, set_volume, destroy_session. Tests included. Requires /orchestrate verification.

tasks.name: Media session management
tasks.description: Implement session state machine with Idle, Loading, Ready, Playing, Paused, Seeking, Ended, Error states
acceptance_criteria: State transitions are valid and enforced

tasks.name: URL media source support
tasks.description: Load and play media from HTTP/HTTPS URLs

tasks.name: Buffer media source support
tasks.description: Play media from raw byte buffers with MIME type detection

tasks.name: Stream media source support
tasks.description: Handle streaming media sources with chunk-based delivery via mpsc channels

tasks.name: Media Source Extensions (MSE) support
tasks.description: Implement MSE API for JavaScript-driven adaptive streaming

tasks.name: WebRTC media source support
tasks.description: Handle WebRTC media streams from peer connections

tasks.name: Device capture source support
tasks.description: Capture media from screen, camera, and microphone devices

tasks.name: VideoFrame representation
tasks.description: Implement VideoFrame struct with width, height, format, data, timestamp, duration, metadata

tasks.name: AudioBuffer representation
tasks.description: Implement AudioBuffer struct with format, sample_rate, channels, samples, timestamp, duration

tasks.name: Pipeline orchestration module
tasks.description: Coordinate media pipeline components: source → demuxer → decoder → sync → output
tasks.reconciliation_notes: Work detected via /orch-reconcile-queue. MediaPipeline with state machine (Idle→Loading→Ready→Running→Stopped), load_source, start, stop, seek methods, video/audio queues. Tests included. Requires /orchestrate verification.

tasks.name: Source reader module
tasks.description: Abstract source reading for files, URLs, streams, and buffers

tasks.name: Demuxer abstraction layer
tasks.description: Common demuxer interface for all container formats
tasks.reconciliation_notes: Work detected via /orch-reconcile-queue. Demuxer trait with parse(), get_video_track(), get_audio_track() methods. Used by MP4, Ogg parsers. Requires /orchestrate verification.

tasks.name: Decoder abstraction layer
tasks.description: Common decoder interface for all video and audio codecs
tasks.reconciliation_notes: Work detected via /orch-reconcile-queue. VideoDecoder and AudioDecoder traits with decode(), flush() methods. DecoderFactory pattern in video_decoders and audio_decoders. Requires /orchestrate verification.

tasks.name: A/V synchronization controller
tasks.description: Synchronize audio and video streams within ±40ms tolerance
tasks.reconciliation_notes: Work detected via /orch-reconcile-queue. AVSyncController with ±40ms threshold, SyncDecision enum (Display, Drop, Wait). Full sync logic with tests. Requires /orchestrate verification.

tasks.name: Buffer manager
tasks.description: Manage memory buffers for frames, samples, and packets with configurable limits

tasks.name: Ring buffer for streaming
tasks.description: Implement efficient ring buffer for streaming media data

tasks.name: Frame cache module
tasks.description: Cache decoded frames for seeking and buffer management

tasks.name: GStreamer integration (Phase 1)
tasks.description: Implement media playback using GStreamer with gstreamer-rs bindings

tasks.name: Progressive download support
tasks.description: Support progressive download for HTTP media files

tasks.name: HLS manifest parsing
tasks.description: Parse HLS (m3u8) manifests for adaptive streaming

tasks.name: DASH manifest parsing
tasks.description: Parse DASH (MPD) manifests for adaptive streaming

tasks.name: Adaptive bitrate switching
tasks.description: Implement ABR algorithm for quality adaptation based on bandwidth

tasks.name: VA-API hardware acceleration (Linux)
tasks.description: Implement hardware-accelerated video decoding using VA-API on Linux

tasks.name: DXVA hardware acceleration (Windows)
tasks.description: Implement hardware-accelerated video decoding using DXVA2/D3D11VA on Windows

tasks.name: VideoToolbox hardware acceleration (macOS)
tasks.description: Implement hardware-accelerated video decoding using VideoToolbox on macOS

tasks.name: Software decode fallback mechanism
tasks.description: Automatic fallback from hardware to software decoding when hardware unavailable

tasks.name: WebRTC encode/decode pipeline
tasks.description: Implement real-time video encoding/decoding for WebRTC
acceptance_criteria: Encode VP8, VP9, H.264 for WebRTC

tasks.name: RTP/RTCP handling
tasks.description: Implement RTP packetization and RTCP feedback for WebRTC

tasks.name: Jitter buffer implementation
tasks.description: Implement adaptive jitter buffer for smooth WebRTC playback

tasks.name: Echo cancellation
tasks.description: Implement acoustic echo cancellation for WebRTC audio

tasks.name: EME API implementation
tasks.description: Implement Encrypted Media Extensions API for DRM playback

tasks.name: CDM interface implementation
tasks.description: Implement Content Decryption Module interface for DRM

tasks.name: License acquisition
tasks.description: Implement DRM license acquisition and renewal

tasks.name: Secure video path
tasks.description: Implement secure video path to prevent clear frame exposure in DRM playback
acceptance_criteria: No clear frames in system memory

tasks.name: Screen capture API
tasks.description: Implement screen capture for media recording and WebRTC

tasks.name: Camera capture API
tasks.description: Implement camera capture for WebRTC and media recording

tasks.name: Microphone capture API
tasks.description: Implement microphone capture for WebRTC and audio recording

tasks.name: Control thread implementation
tasks.description: Implement main control thread for handling API calls

tasks.name: Demuxer thread implementation
tasks.description: Implement dedicated thread for container parsing

tasks.name: Video decode thread pool
tasks.description: Implement thread pool for parallel video frame decoding

tasks.name: Audio decode thread
tasks.description: Implement dedicated thread for audio decoding

tasks.name: Network I/O thread
tasks.description: Implement dedicated thread for network streaming I/O

tasks.name: Hardware decode thread
tasks.description: Implement dedicated thread for hardware-accelerated decoding

tasks.name: Thread communication channels
tasks.description: Implement mpsc channels for inter-thread communication

tasks.name: CreateMediaElement message handler
tasks.description: Handle CreateMediaElement messages from Browser Shell

tasks.name: StreamData message handler
tasks.description: Handle StreamData messages from Network Stack

tasks.name: PlaybackCommand message handler
tasks.description: Handle PlaybackCommand messages from DOM/JavaScript

tasks.name: AddRemoteStream message handler
tasks.description: Handle AddRemoteStream messages from WebRTC

tasks.name: VideoFrameReady event emitter
tasks.description: Emit VideoFrameReady events to Render Engine

tasks.name: AudioSamplesReady event emitter
tasks.description: Emit AudioSamplesReady events to Audio subsystem

tasks.name: PlaybackStateChanged event emitter
tasks.description: Emit PlaybackStateChanged events to DOM/JavaScript

tasks.name: MediaError event emitter
tasks.description: Emit MediaError events for error reporting

tasks.name: BufferingProgress event emitter
tasks.description: Emit BufferingProgress events for loading feedback

tasks.name: Input validation for media sources
tasks.description: Validate URL schemes, MIME types, and container headers
acceptance_criteria: Validate URL schemes (http, https, file, blob)
Check file permissions for local files
Validate MIME types against allowed list

tasks.name: Memory safety in parsing
tasks.description: Implement bounds checking and recursion limits in container parsers
acceptance_criteria: Bounds checking on all buffer accesses

tasks.name: Sandbox integration for decoders
tasks.description: Run decoders in sandboxed subprocess for security isolation

tasks.name: Performance metrics collection
tasks.description: Collect decode time, frame drops, buffer health, and quality metrics

tasks.name: Prometheus metrics export
tasks.description: Export media engine metrics in Prometheus format

tasks.name: Timestamp utilities
tasks.description: Implement timestamp conversion, discontinuity handling, and PTS/DTS management

tasks.name: MediaError type definitions
tasks.description: Define comprehensive error types: UnsupportedFormat, Codec, Network, DRM, Hardware, Memory, State

tasks.name: Error recovery strategies
tasks.description: Implement automatic recovery: software fallback, retry with backoff, cache clearing

tasks.name: 4K@60fps hardware decode playback
tasks.description: Achieve 4K@60fps playback with <5% CPU using hardware acceleration

tasks.name: 1080p@30fps software decode playback
tasks.description: Achieve 1080p@30fps software decode with <30% CPU single core
acceptance_criteria: No dropped frames under normal conditions

tasks.name: Seek latency optimization
tasks.description: Achieve seek latency <100ms for local content, <1000ms for network

tasks.name: Startup time optimization
tasks.description: Achieve first frame display in <500ms

tasks.name: Pure Rust H.264 decoder (Phase 3)
tasks.description: Replace GStreamer H.264 with pure Rust implementation

tasks.name: Remove GStreamer dependency (Phase 3)
tasks.description: Complete migration to pure Rust media engine, removing GStreamer

tasks.name: WPT media tests integration
tasks.description: Integrate Web Platform Tests for media APIs

tasks.name: Integration tests for playback
tasks.description: Comprehensive integration tests for video/audio playback

tasks.name: Performance benchmarks
tasks.description: Implement decode throughput, latency, and memory benchmarks

tasks.name: Test asset management
tasks.description: Manage test media files for unit and integration tests

tasks.name: Tracing and logging infrastructure
tasks.description: Implement structured logging and tracing for debugging

tasks.name: Platform-specific build scripts
tasks.description: Implement build.rs for platform-specific linking (VA-API, DXVA, VideoToolbox)

tasks.name: Cargo feature flags
tasks.description: Implement feature flags for optional codec/backend selection
